resources.string: With eZAKAT, you can calculate your zakat anytime, anywhere, and also find your eligibility for Zakat.
Email any of your suggestions, questions or complaints to:

Zakat Foundation is a Perlis-based NGO providing emergency relief, post-disaster rehabilitation, sustainable development, education, healthcare, orphan sponsorship, and seasonal programs such as Ramadan Iftars and Qurban.

In ensuring that the goals and functions of the establishment of eZakat are on the right track, our vision and mission is used as a guide so that the administration of collection and distribution of zakat continues to grow rapidly and help asnaf in the state of Perlis to get out of poverty.
